items.title: Freelance Experience ‚Äì E-commerce Website Development
items.subTitle: Full Stack Developer
details: Developed a fully functional e-commerce website featuring product management, user authentication, and order processing with coupon management.
Designed a modern, responsive user interface to ensure smooth navigation and an engaging user experience.
Built a Laravel-based backend with an intuitive admin dashboard for managing products, categories, and orders.
Worked closely with the client to define requirements, suggest improvements, and deliver the final product on time.

items.title: MT Informatique ‚Äì Final Year Internship Project
items.subTitle: Full Stack Developer
details: Developed a web application as part of the final academic project, using Laravel and modern front-end technologies.
Built a complete e-commerce platform featuring product, category, and order management modules.
Developed a multi-role system with three dashboards: admin, employee, and client, each with distinct features and permissions.
Documented the project and successfully presented it to the academic jury.
